GSD.description:
ALSA: timer: Use deferred fasync helper

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 9df447cd63e6078e28dc73ea3bc1bac91156259e. For more details please see the references link.
